Serpentor/Nemesis Enforcer:


::Serpentor stopped, seeing Zardus:: "Open the door and let me go, OR DIE!"
::A powerful red blast of plasma energy launched out Zardus, the robot 
standing in front of the exit::

===============================================================

::Nemesis saw Serpentor threaten Zardus, Nemesis taking out his missile 
launcher, firing off a rocket:: "SAY HELLO TO MY LITTLE FRIEND!" 
(unfortunately, Nemesis didn't think about Zardus, who was standing right 
there)
